jcr:content.jcr:title: List of Syriac Orthodox Patriarchs of Antioch

contentheadline.headline: List of Syriac Orthodox Patriarchs of Antioch

contentrichtext.text: {{Eastern Christianity}} The '''Syriac Orthodox Patriarch of Antioch''' is the head of the [[Syriac Orthodox Church]]. The following is a list of [[Primate_(religion)|primates]] who have held that office. == Syriac Patriarchs of Antioch before 1783== *{{For|Patriarchs of Antioch before 512|List of Patriarchs of Antioch}} *{{For|Syriac Patriarchs of Antioch from 512 to 1783|List of Syriac Patriarchs of Antioch from 512 to 1783}} ==Syriac Orthodox Patriarchs of Antioch (1783 to present)== *[[Ignatius Matthew]] (1783–1817) *[[Ignatius Yunan]] (1817–1818) *[[Ignatius George V]] (1819–1837) *[[Ignatius Elias II]] (1838–1847) *[[Ignatius Jacob II]] (1847–1871) *[[Ignatius Peter IV]] (1872–1894) *[[Ignatius Abdul Masih II]] (1895–1905) *[[Ignatius Abded Aloho II]] (1906–1915) - SPLIT of [[Indian Orthodox Church]] during his reign *[[Ignatius Elias III]] (1917–1932) *[[Ignatius Afram I Barsoum]] (1933–1957) *[[Ignatius Jacob III]] (1957–1980) - REUNION with the [[Indian Orthodox Church]] in 1958 and SPLIT in 1972 *[[Ignatius Zakka I Iwas]] (1980–present) ==See also== *[[Greek Patriarch of Antioch]] *[[Catholicos of the East]] *[[List of Catholicos of the East]] *[[List of Syriac Catholic Patriarchs of Antioch]] ==External links== *[http://www.wikisyr.com/pmwiki.php?n=Menu.PatriarchesAntiocheMonophysites Patriarches monophysites d'Antioche depuis 468] - sur '''[http://www.wikisyr.com wikisyr.com]''' *[http://www.wikisyr.com/pmwiki.php?n=Menu.PatriarcatSyriens-orthodoxes Patriarches syriens orthodoxes depuis 1622] - sur '''[http://www.wikisyr.com wikisyr.com]''' *[http://sor.cua.edu/Patriarchate/PatriarchsChronList.html Chronological List of the Patriarchs of Antioch] *[http://www.yauno.com/modules.php?name=News&file=article&sid=237 Complete List of Patriarchs of Antioch (German)] {{Syriac Orthodox Patriarch of Antioch}} [[Category:Patriarchs of Antioch|*]] [[Category:Syriac Orthodox Church]] [[Category:Syriac people]] [[Category:Oriental Orthodoxy-related lists]] [[Category:Lists of patriarchs|Syriac]]
